RMODFLOW
  • Reference
  • Articles

Read a MODFLOW layer-property flow file

read_lpf reads in a MODFLOW layer property file and returns it as an RMODFLOW lpf object.

read_lpf(file = {     cat("Please select lpf file ...\n")     file.choose()
  })

Arguments

file
filename; typically '*.lpf'

Value

object of class lpf

See also

write_lpf, create_lpf and http://water.usgs.gov/nrp/gwsoftware/modflow2000/MFDOC/index.html?lpf.htm

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
  • See also
